title: Unwind doesn't reset tx nonce state
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `2022.09.3-stable-32bd69e5` (09.03 Release)

OS & Version: Linux

Commit hash : [v2022.09.03](https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/tree/v2022.09.03)

#### Erigon running parameters
Syncing `bor-mainnet` full node (pruning `hrtc` with 300,000) from scratch using `snapshots=true`:
```
./erigon \
  --chain=bor-mainnet \
 --snapshots=true \
  --datadir=./polygon-mainnet/chaindata \
  --prune=hrtc --prune.h.older=300_000 --prune.c.older=300_000 --prune.t.older=300_000 --prune.r.older=300_000 \
  --db.pagesize=8kb \
  --bor.heimdall=https://heimdall-api.polygon.technology
  ```

#### Failing execution behaviour
Erigon executed blocks during `[7/16 Execution]` from 0 to 33,176,576 without any issues, then failed with:
```
[INFO] [09-28|16:57:28.032] [7/16 Execution] Executed blocks         number=33175126 blk/s=18.4 tx/s=1170.0 Mgas/s=220.8 gasState=0.74 estimated duration=192h28m31.434s batch=693.6MB alloc=4.7GB sys=12.5GB
[INFO] [09-28|16:57:48.004] [7/16 Execution] Executed blocks         number=33175537 blk/s=20.6 tx/s=1147.2 Mgas/s=265.2 gasState=0.75 estimated duration=192h17m44.170s batch=702.5MB alloc=6.7GB sys=12.5GB
[INFO] [09-28|16:58:08.274] [7/16 Execution] Executed blocks         number=33175872 blk/s=16.5 tx/s=1471.5 Mgas/s=223.1 gasState=0.76 estimated duration=192h8m37.698s batch=709.8MB alloc=4.6GB sys=12.5GB
[INFO] [09-28|16:58:11.495] [txpool] stat                            block=32806896 pending=10000 baseFee=0 queued=30000 alloc=5.0GB sys=12.5GB
[INFO] [09-28|16:58:28.034] [7/16 Execution] Executed blocks         number=33176256 blk/s=19.4 tx/s=1240.1 Mgas/s=204.3 gasState=0.77 estimated duration=192h0m33.301s batch=717.0MB alloc=6.5GB sys=12.5GB
[WARN] [09-28|16:58:45.021] [7/16 Execution] Execution failed        block=33176576 hash=0x38c1f412b8ea5a9b539bc066b7570096fba2bb98762a50297692c47dc7969b68 err="bucket: TransactionLog, mdbx_cursor_put: MDBX_EKEYMISMATCH: The given key value is mismatched to the current cursor position"
[INFO] [09-28|16:58:45.021] UnwindTo                                 block=33176575 bad_block_hash=0x38c1f412b8ea5a9b539bc066b7570096fba2bb98762a50297692c47dc7969b68
[INFO] [09-28|16:58:52.923] Flushed buffer file                      name=/home/blockvis/polygon-mainnet/chaindata/etl-temp/erigon-sortable-buf-1437233412 alloc=5.8GB sys=12.5GB
[INFO] [09-28|16:58:59.915] Flushed buffer file                      name=/home/blockvis/polygon-mainnet/chaindata/etl-temp/erigon-sortable-buf-3860167773 alloc=6.1GB sys=12.5GB
[INFO] [09-28|16:59:01.136] Flushed buffer file                      name=/home/blockvis/polygon-mainnet/chaindata/etl-temp/erigon-sortable-buf-4046150857 alloc=6.1GB sys=12.5GB
[INFO] [09-28|16:59:10.825] [p2p] GoodPeers                          eth66=100
[INFO] [09-28|16:59:11.496] [txpool] stat                            block=32806896 pending=10000 baseFee=0 queued=30000 alloc=6.6GB sys=12.5GB
[INFO] [09-28|16:59:31.138] [] ETL [2/2] Loading                     into=PlainState current key=59b25ab0... alloc=7.1GB sys=12.5GB
[INFO] [09-28|17:00:01.137] [] ETL [2/2] Loading                     into=PlainState current key=886cca82... alloc=7.9GB sys=12.5GB
[INFO] [09-28|17:00:13.351] [txpool] stat                            block=32806896 pending=10000 baseFee=0 queued=30000 alloc=4.6GB sys=12.5GB
[INFO] [09-28|17:00:31.137] [] ETL [2/2] Loading                     into=PlainState current key=b2435253... alloc=5.1GB sys=12.5GB
[INFO] [09-28|17:01:01.138] [] ETL [2/2] Loading                     into=PlainState current key=dce37f71... alloc=5.9GB sys=12.5GB
[INFO] [09-28|17:01:10.825] [p2p] GoodPeers                          eth66=100
[INFO] [09-28|17:01:11.495] [txpool] stat                            block=32806896 pending=10000 baseFee=0 queued=30000 alloc=6.3GB sys=12.5GB
[INFO] [09-28|17:01:18.007] [] etl: temp files removed               total size=397.6MB
[INFO] [09-28|17:01:18.007] Write to db                              progress=5.9M/10.6M current table=IncarnationMap
[INFO] [09-28|17:02:11.495] [txpool] stat                            block=32806896 pending=10000 baseFee=0 queued=30000 alloc=3.4GB sys=12.5GB
[INFO] [09-28|17:02:33.460] [7/16 Execution] Completed on            block=33176575
[INFO] [09-28|17:02:33.460] [7/16 Execution] DONE                    in=117h55m5.461567212s
[INFO] [09-28|17:02:53.469] [5/16 Bodies] Unwinding transactions...  current block=33198390
[INFO] [09-28|17:03:10.825] [p2p] GoodPeers                          eth66=100
[INFO] [09-28|17:03:11.495] [txpool] stat                            block=32806896 pending=10000 baseFee=0 queued=30000 alloc=4.5GB sys=12.5GB
[INFO] [09-28|17:03:13.470] [5/16 Bodies] Unwinding transactions...  current block=33223744
[INFO] [09-28|17:03:33.475] [5/16 Bodies] Unwinding transactions...  current block=33251272
[INFO] [09-28|17:03:53.468] [5/16 Bodies] Unwinding transactions...  current block=33272937
```

#### Unwind
Print stages from `integration` gave me following:

```
./integration --datadir=./polygon-mainnet/chaindata --chain=bor-mainnet print_stages
Note: prune_at doesn't mean 'all data before were deleted' - it just mean stage.Prune function were run to this block. Because 1 stage may prune multiple data types to different prune distance.

 				 stage_at 	 prune_at
Snapshots 			 32706999 	 0
Headers 			 33176575 	 0
BlockHashes 			 33176575 	 0
Bodies 				 33176575 	 0
Senders 			 33176575 	 0
Execution 			 33176575 	 0
Translation 			 0 		 0
HashState 			 0 		 0
IntermediateHashes 		 0 		 0
AccountHistoryIndex 		 0 		 0
StorageHistoryIndex 		 0 		 0
LogIndex 			 0 		 0
CallTraces 			 0 		 0
TxLookup 			 0 		 0
Finish 				 0 		 0
--
prune distance: --prune.h.older=300000 --prune.r.older=300000 --prune.t.older=300000 --prune.c.older=300000

sequence: EthTx=2095475337, NonCanonicalTx=0

first header in db: 32707000
first body in db: 32707000

--
snapsthos: blocks=32706999, segments=32706999, indices=32706999

```

I decided to unwind 1000 blocks using following commands:
```
./integration --datadir=./polygon-mainnet/chaindata --chain=bor-mainnet stage_exec --unwind=1000
INFO[09-28|20:02:08.249] Stage                                    name=Execution progress=33176575
INFO[09-28|20:02:08.250] [7/16 Execution] Unwind Execution        from=33176575 to=33175575
./integration --datadir=./polygon-mainnet/chaindata --chain=bor-mainnet stage_senders --unwind=1000
INFO[09-28|20:02:36.572] Stage                                    name=Senders progress=33176575
./integration --datadir=./polygon-mainnet/chaindata --chain=bor-mainnet stage_bodies --unwind=1000
INFO[09-28|20:03:00.242] Progress                                 bodies=33175575
./integration --datadir=./polygon-mainnet/chaindata --chain=bor-mainnet stage_headers --unwind=1000
```

Then launched Erigon as usual, but got another error shortly after:
````
[INFO] [09-28|20:32:39.803] [6/16 Senders] Recovery                  block_number=33601692
[INFO] [09-28|20:33:09.804] [6/16 Senders] Recovery                  block_number=33674992
[INFO] [09-28|20:33:13.891] Flushed buffer file                      name=/home/blockvis/polygon-mainnet/chaindata/etl-temp/erigon-sortable-buf-363305139 alloc=6.3GB sys=9.9GB
[INFO] [09-28|20:33:14.882] [6/16 Senders] etl: temp files removed   total size=650.2MB
[INFO] [09-28|20:33:14.917] [6/16 Senders] DONE                      in=3m5.120094033s
[INFO] [09-28|20:33:14.917] [7/16 Execution] Blocks execution        from=33175575 to=33684601
[WARN] [09-28|20:33:14.918] [7/16 Execution] Execution failed        block=33175576 hash=0x820b95115eb8bb7f149c5227c4fba3ad29c2d6d64d43ff43ec33bca1f498cf4b err="could not apply tx 0 from block 33175576 [0xf382e90e04be1a5cbb034d0e3b8b9b49fbe2a78838b773665271302af4e7ab47]: nonce too low: address 0xf89d7b9c864f589bbF53a82105107622B35EaA40, tx: 123985 state: 124012"
[INFO] [09-28|20:33:14.918] UnwindTo                                 block=33175575 bad_block_hash=0x820b95115eb8bb7f149c5227c4fba3ad29c2d6d64d43ff43ec33bca1f498cf4b
[INFO] [09-28|20:33:14.918] [7/16 Execution] Completed on            block=33175575
[INFO] [09-28|20:33:18.012] [txpool] stat                            block=33176575 pending=10000 baseFee=0 queued=30000 alloc=6.4GB sys=9.9GB
[INFO] [09-28|20:33:34.919] [5/16 Bodies] Unwinding transactions...  current block=33488924
[INFO] [09-28|20:33:48.169] Got interrupt, shutting down... 
[INFO] [09-28|20:33:48.169] Exiting... 
````

After unwinding another 5576 blocks it still gives me "Execution failed" with "nonce too low" error:
```
INFO[09-29|07:07:22.062] [6/16 Senders] Recovery                  block_number=33667603
INFO[09-29|07:07:23.817] [p2p] GoodPeers                          eth66=44
INFO[09-29|07:07:24.438] [txpool] stat                            block=33169998 pending=10000 baseFee=0 queued=30000 alloc=6.2GB sys=10.4GB
INFO[09-29|07:07:35.840] Flushed buffer file                      name=/home/blockvis/polygon-mainnet/chaindata/etl-temp/erigon-sortable-buf-2923153075 alloc=5.6GB sys=10.4GB
INFO[09-29|07:07:36.735] [6/16 Senders] etl: temp files removed   total size=682.9MB
INFO[09-29|07:07:36.837] [6/16 Senders] DONE                      in=3m14.783333009s
INFO[09-29|07:07:36.837] [7/16 Execution] Blocks execution        from=33169999 to=33703293
WARN[09-29|07:07:36.838] [7/16 Execution] Execution failed        block=33170000 hash=0xf8375723a4d56c3d0eec579be928fde504e790f5eac51b90fc0feb9247d15340 err="could not apply tx 0 from block 33170000 [0x4de3364db1cc7c7e563b412409a9a54be006cd3749511d3f8c1e4eb35280be76]: nonce too low: address 0xa200e33D0DDe329297A807D043ca64b3aE6Dff97, tx: 94421 state: 97233"
INFO[09-29|07:07:36.838] UnwindTo                                 block=33169999 bad_block_hash=0xf8375723a4d56c3d0eec579be928fde504e790f5eac51b90fc0feb9247d15340
INFO[09-29|07:07:36.838] [7/16 Execution] Completed on            block=33169999
INFO[09-29|07:07:56.839] [5/16 Bodies] Unwinding transactions...  current block=33476141
INFO[09-29|07:08:17.194] [2/16 Headers] Waiting for headers...    from=33169999
INFO[09-29|07:08:24.426] [txpool] stat                            block=33169998 pending=10000 baseFee=0 queued=30000 alloc=3.4GB sys=10.4GB
^CINFO[09-29|07:08:53.749] Got interrupt, shutting down..
```
while `print_stages` shows that every stage is on the same number:
```
 				 stage_at 	 prune_at
Snapshots 			 32706999 	 0
Headers 			 33169999 	 0
BlockHashes 			 33169999 	 0
Bodies 				 33169999 	 0
Senders 			 33169999 	 0
Execution 			 33169999 	 0
Translation 			 0 		 0
HashState 			 0 		 0
IntermediateHashes 		 0 		 0
AccountHistoryIndex 		 0 		 0
StorageHistoryIndex 		 0 		 0
LogIndex 			 0 		 0
CallTraces 			 0 		 0
TxLookup 			 0 		 0
Finish 				 0 		 0
```

I don't want to reset state to loose all the progress of 33,000,000+ executed blocks (which takes more than a week!). 

How can I unwind nonce state gracefully?
bor comes with an error in that version of erigon so that will always happen it is not the unwinding tool failing. The fix is in this commit a968c7ed5b1915c9b28d08eed6efe92f2be73edb
@enriavil1 is it possible to run erigon v2022.10.01 polygon node with pruning enabled?
I believe that shouldn't be a problem
Ok, thanks. So far my Mumbai testnet archive node is running fine on the new version, mainnet is still executing blocks. Unfortunately due to chain size it takes a couple of days or even longer.
